JobTitle: Sr. Manager, Public Relations & Reputation - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: The Team:Storytelling is at the heart of VMware’s future growth; with great stories we inspire our customers, influencers, stakeholders, and employees with the positive impact VMware technologies can have in business and the world. The Global Communications team leads the reputation and storytelling function at VMware. We are a team of around 90 global communications professionals spanning public relations, reputation management, industry analyst relations, executive communications, integrated storytelling, and employee communications. It’s a fast paced, dynamic, and exciting environment in a high-growth company. We’re looking for team members who have big bold goals, a great attitude, who are smart, thoughtful, collaborative, and organized, and who thrive at the center of always-on communications. Job Role:VMware is looking for a passionate communicator, a dynamic storyteller, a trusted communications advisor, and a news junkie who is always looking for the next key story.This role is focused on Corporate Public Relations with a goal of increasing awareness, reputation, and impact of our company stories with key business press and broadcast outlets. He/she will be responsible for proactively identifying opportunities to advance the company’s strategy, address issues, strengthen alignment and help convey the company’s purpose, vision and priorities.As a key member of the Corporate Reputation and PR team, this person will lead efforts in driving Environment, Social and Governance (ESG) stories to key influencers. He/she will be comfortable in a connected environment, sharing responsibility for collective outcomes, working across communications and marketing functions to drive impact. He/she will also regularly provide strategic counsel to senior leaders regarding overall public relations strategy.Responsibilities Include:Lead ongoing optimization of Corporate PR, including executive media strategy and execution (business and broadcast), financial communications, and leadership profiles.Collaborate with technology PR and “owned content” teams to drive awareness for VMware’s corporate narrative.Drive an increase in business press, broadcast placements globallyProvide proactive thought leadership insights on the evolving business media landscape.Work across the team to develop story and assets, drive media relations, and manage creative channel and content execution. Partner with agencies to drive both proactive and reactive Public Relations strategy.Basic
